summary: Over the 6-hour window wind was steady at low-to-moderate speed (mean ≈ 5.9 m/s, std ≈ 0.55) with a single peak to 13.9 m/s; power stayed low and relatively stable (mean ≈ 0.18, std ≈ 0.054) with a small negative residual (~-0.06). Rotor speed variability was minimal while generator speed variability was markedly higher (std ≈ 56 vs ≈ 0.5), pitch averaged about −1.65°, yaw misalignment averaged ~8.16°, temperature was ≈47.5°C, and no status changes were recorded.
